sentences.sContent: Because it is located in a very hot and dry region, the Dead Sea loses much water through evaporation, causing its level to fluctuate during the year.
sentences.sContent_eng: Because it is located in a very hot and dry region, the Dead Sea loses much water through evaporation, causing its level to fluctuate during the year.
sentences.sCn: 因为它处于一个非常炎热和干燥的地区，死海由于蒸发损失掉大量的水，导致其水平面一年到头不断波动。

sentences.sContent: There has not been much change in rainfall in those areas but the temperature has risen by over 1 degree Centigrade since 1970, which will have enhanced losses due to evaporation.
sentences.sContent_eng: There has not been much change in rainfall in those areas but the temperature has risen by over 1 degree Centigrade since 1970, which will have enhanced losses due to evaporation.
sentences.sCn: 那些地区的降雨量没有太大变化，但是自1970年以来上升的气温已经超过了1摄氏度，由于蒸发这将会造成水分的更大流失。

phrases.pCn: 真空蒸发；真空蒸镀；真空涂膜
蒸发（容）量，蒸发能力；蒸发率

remMethod.val: 来自evaporate(v. 蒸发； 消失)； e(出) + vapor(水汽) + ate(使…) → 使水汽出去 → 蒸发

words.tran: 浓缩的；脱水的；蒸发干燥的
蒸发；消失（evaporate的过去式）；失去水分
